survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the workplace coffee station to improve offerings and satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the workplace coffee station?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency of use.

script.question_text: How often do you use the workplace coffee station?

questions.question_text: Which types of coffee do you typically consume from the workplace coffee station? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected 'Multiple times a day', 'Once a day', or 'A few times a week' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice scale to capture preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for specification.

script.question_text: Which types of coffee do you typically consume from the workplace coffee station? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected 'Multiple times a day', 'Once a day', or 'A few times a week' in Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of coffee provided at the workplace coffee station?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected 'Multiple times a day', 'Once a day', or 'A few times a week' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice Likert scale to measure satisfaction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of coffee provided at the workplace coffee station?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected 'Multiple times a day', 'Once a day', or 'A few times a week' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the workplace coffee station?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q3.
questions.client_notes: Open-text field to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the workplace coffee station?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q3.

questions.question_text: How important is the availability of a coffee station to your overall workplace satisfaction?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure importance.

script.question_text: How important is the availability of a coffee station to your overall workplace satisfaction?
